normal.name: Lake Sword
normal.description: Deals holy damage to enemy unit equal to 12% of own maximum HP

auto.name: Lake Sacred Shield
auto.description: Adds a [Shield] equal to 5.1% of max HP to self. [Shield] can stack up to 30% of HP limit.

ultimate.name: Blooming Knight's Flower
ultimate.description: Immediately moves in front of specified enemy unit. All team characters receive 24% less damage for 15 seconds.

passive.name: Lake Spirit's Blessing
passive.description: When HP drops below 50% after taking damage: Recover 9.6% of maximum HP every 3 seconds. Effect lasts for 15 seconds.

teamSkill.name: Combination Skill
teamSkill.description: Own maximum HP increased by 10%. Defense increased by 10%.

awakenings.effect: When attacked, if having a shield, damage taken is reduced by 10%
[Skills] and [Normal Attack] level and level cap +4
Recovery amount from passive effect increased by 100%.)

memoryCard.name: Lancelot-HerTrainer
effects: Defense increased by 36%, After entering battle, all our characters take 8% less damage, same skill effects cannot stack
